item.title: VritualBox Whonix restoring snapshot - Error 'lsilogicsas' VERR_SSM_LOADED_TOO_LITTLE
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
VERR_SSM_LOADED_TOO_LITTLE

VirtulaBox upstream bug:

  • Error 'lsilogicsas' (VERR_SSM_LOADED_TOO_LITTLE) when opening a saved session

  • https://forums.virtualbox.org/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=68977

Workaround: shut down VMs before taking snapshots.

Non-solutions: switching virtual hard disk controller to SATA AHCI due to:

  • https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/issues/274
  • ATA Freeze
  • https://www.virtualbox.org/ticket/10031

Maybe some other vrtual hard disk controller would be affected by neither snapshot restore not ata freeze bug?
